name: Delivery King
text: This Papa John's is a let down in every aspect imaginable. The people are right when they say the staff just doesn't care. Delivery drivers can be seen outside the store front smoking away. Not even Shaq can help save this store. It's a ‚Ä¶More

name: Douglas Walker
text: First time trying papa johns, never will again. Tasteless and lukewarm.

name: Laurie Lhouse
text: Delicious pizza tonight! Well made....Finished early. Prompt counter service to pick up.

name: Lindsay Scott
text: Easily the worst local option for pizza. They‚Äôre rude, don‚Äôt answer the phone and if they do it‚Äôs to put you on hold. Order is 30 mins late with no apology or explanation. They clearly don‚Äôt need the business.

name: Eric Helms
text: Consistently miss their estimated delivery times by a LOT... I‚Äôm waiting right now, 1 hour and 20 mins late...

name: Asher Heimermann
text: Multiple failed attempts to place an order. No one answers the phone. Online ordering never works.

name: Kyle Sershon
text: Terrible customer service. Manager could care less about my concerns and felt it was better to interrupt then actually listen. Told me right from the start it basically wasn't his problem. Last time I'm ordering from here.

name: Zia Rahman
text: Horrible service. Placed an order. They canceled after waiting for over an hour and did not give any reason. They would not pick up the phone despite calling multiple times.

name: Chris Ebright
text: Awful location. Delivery is constantly slow and the the majority of the time they get something wrong with the order. When calling about a messed up order we were hung up on.

name: Tibisay Pulido
text: More than hour to get the pizza and it was cold... after that I called twice and I was on hold alll the time.. the second called they even asked to put me on hold.. just immediately put me on hold.. recognize it was me again with the phone number.. very very bad service.

name: Dennis Yu
text: Unprofessional area supervisor Ms. Misty Holden when setting an appointment at least remind TO CALL if there are changes not just no CALL NO show. I travel 20 mins and NO SHOW!  That's why I saw the store you don't have crew or proper crew because you should set a good example and be a right model.

name: Ajit Kalra
text: Great staff here. Completely customer centric service. Best PJ location in Chicagoland, and I've been to at least a dozen. Pizza was well made with consistent flavors.

name: The Death Midwife
text: If I could give this place a negative rating of 200 stars, I would. Their casual flippancy and shoulder shrug response to spectacularly screwing up was epic. I ordered over $100.00 worth of pizza for a moving crew of big guys.  Over an ‚Ä¶More

name: Mia HJ Choi
text: Ordered online in advance. Delivered exactly 55 min later than the designated time. Called the store couple times and they hung up.

name: Scott Tocs
text: Great Papa John's location in Highland Park. Always received a fresh hot pizza from this location.

name: Jesus Valle
text: Everything is always undercooked. I had to put my chicken wings in the oven because they were so raw. The sausage taste like breakfast link sausages, it's utterly disgusting. I tried giving then more than one chance only for them to disappoint, even more than before. Never eating Papa John's ever again.

name: Makayla Temple
text: My pizza was not only almost 40 mins late but it was also cold. And I was still charged $30 when it wasn't even worth $5. I ordered it at 1030 am for 1pm.

name: Yan Liu
text: Deliver guy got lost with a dead phone. Ruined my daughter 's birthday party. Never will go there

name: Kate Riggs
text: Whatever estimated delivery time you‚Äôre given, double it and add 20. We‚Äôve tried a few times, hoping each time was just a fluke...but it‚Äôs not. Order only if you can wait 90 minutes for your pizza.

name: Shreyas Shah
text: Turns out the store is closed.

name: Chris Enders
text: Decent pizza

name: Steven Collins
text: Great customer service

name: Asia Bettencourt
text: great pizza!

name: Marisa Mann
text: Order cancelled with no notice.

name: Steve Marzullo
text: I don't like it at all

name: Abby Speck
text: I'm the lady on the phone üòè

name: Jake Lorenson
text: Friendly staff

name: Kaitlyn Pence
text: Best pizza hands down.
